Get Jimmy Byrd's data into the format expected by our script.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
files <- Sys.glob("~/Dropbox/Byrd - Civil War text files -Shared/*.txt")
texts <- map_chr(files, read_file)
ids <- basename(files)
byrd_texts <- data_frame(pageid = ids, text = texts)
saveRDS(byrd_texts, "data/byrd-texts.rds")
```
